source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000010_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ah, there you are. May I assume you've had your fill of rest?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000010_MYSTERYVOICEあなたも来てくれたか。
戦いの準備は万全だととっても？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000020_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>That is well. Now that we are all present, let us speak of our plan.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000020_MYSTERYVOICE大いに結構。
それでは、全員そろったことだ、今後についての話をしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000030_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Thus far, we have vanquished four Lightwardens, restoring night to much of Norvrandt.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000030_MYSTERYVOICEあなた方が討伐した大罪喰いは4体……
これによって、ノルヴラントの大半の地域から、
過剰な光が掃われた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000040_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Only one remains─that of Kholusia. And with Ryne to guide us, I am certain we will find it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000040_MYSTERYVOICE残すは、コルシア島付近のみ。
そこを領する大罪喰いの居場所も、
リーンが現地に向かうことで特定できるだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000050_ALISAIE<tab>We're so close now. If we can just take care of this one last Warden, we'll rob the sin eaters of their final foothold, and drive them out of Norvrandt once and for all.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000050_ALISAIEそいつを倒せば、
縄張りを示すために放出されていた光が、すべて断たれる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000060_ALISAIE<tab>It will be a new beginning for the First─a chance for the people to rebuild their world.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000060_ALISAIEそうなれば、多くの罪喰いは、ノルヴラントに留まれない。
人も動物も、あらゆる命が奴らの脅威から解放されて、
また少しずつ栄えていく……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000070_ALPHINAUD<tab>In short, a prize worth fighting for.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000070_ALPHINAUDああ、その新たな門出まで送り出すことが、
今の私たちにできる、最大限の協力だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000080_URIANGER<tab>And in thus delivering the First from destruction, so too shall we unsow the seeds of the Eighth Umbral Calamity.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000080_URIANGER同時に、第八霊災の要因を排し、
私たちの未来を繋ぐための、最善手でもありましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000090_YSHTOLA<tab>Do you hear? Your dreamed-of Rejoining is in jeopardy. Are you sure you're not tempted to intervene?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000090_YSHTOLA私たちは、何としても最後の戦いを制して、世界を救うわ。
今さら邪魔はしないでしょうね……アシエン・エメトセルク？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000100_EMETSELCH<tab>(SIGH)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000100_EMETSELCH<tab>はぁ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000110_EMETSELCH<tab>You labor under the misapprehension that vanquishing the sin eaters is tantamount to saving the world. It is not.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000110_EMETSELCH安心しろ、お前たちが罪喰いを倒したとて、
それは世界の救済なんかじゃない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000120_EMETSELCH<tab>In truth, you only delay the inevitable, lengthening your fleeting lives by the smallest of margins.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000120_EMETSELCH今という刹那に生きる儚い命を、
ほんのわずかに、長らえさせるだけの行為だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000130_EMETSELCH<tab>'Twould be churlish of me to deny you this small concession, close as we've become. Foolish and misguided though you are, you are not without charm.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000130_EMETSELCH敵対していると厄介なだけだが、
こうして内側から見るとよくわかる……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000140_EMETSELCH<tab>Each and every one of you is possessed of a noble heart. When the weak want for succor, you do not hesitate to provide it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000140_EMETSELCHお前たちは確かに善良だ。
誰かが頑張れば救われるというときに、その「誰か」になれる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000150_EMETSELCH<tab>Alas, your nobility is shortsighted. You think only of the problem in front of your nose.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000150_EMETSELCHだが、そんな傑物でさえ、
この一瞬、目の前のものを救おうとするだけとは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000160_EMETSELCH<tab>A limitation of your ephemeral existence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000160_EMETSELCH矮小にして狭窄、限定的で刹那的。
ひ弱で短命な生物では、やはりそこが限界か？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000170_ALPHINAUD<tab>Our lives may seem short and insignificant to the likes of you. But one does not need to be an eternal being to achieve lasting change.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000170_ALPHINAUD確かに、不滅なる者である君からすれば、
あらゆる命が短命にも思えるだろう。
だが……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000180_EMETSELCH<tab>Ah, if I may stop you there─I do not claim that we Ascians are <var 1A 02 /var>special<var 1A 01 /var>. That is another misconception.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000180_EMETSELCH<tab>違う、特別なのは私の方じゃない！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000190_EMETSELCH<tab>In the beginning, everyone─<var 1A 02 /var>everyone<var 1A 01 /var> lived nigh for eternity. Such was the natural order of things. But like so much else, this was taken from you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000190_EMETSELCH……昔は誰だって、永遠に近い時を生きていた。
お前たちが、それを捨てたまま歩んできただけだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000200_EMETSELCH<tab>You won't object if I borrow your plaything.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000200_EMETSELCHちょうどいい機会だ。
使わせてもらうとしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000210_EMETSELCH<tab>In the distant past, when the world was one and whole, a great calamity threatened all life.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000210_EMETSELCH<tab>かつて、ひとつだった世界に、大きな災厄があった……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000220_EMETSELCH<tab>It began without warning. The very laws of the star were warped and broken, and chaos swiftly spread throughout the land.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000220_EMETSELCHあまりに唐突にはじまった、星の秩序の崩壊だ。
恐怖と絶望が形を成し、地表を混沌があまねく覆った。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000230_EMETSELCH<tab>Faced with annihilation, we sought to imbue the star with its own will. Thus was Zodiark born, and by His power was order restored.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000230_EMETSELCHこのままでは、すべての命が絶えてしまう……
そこで人々は、ゾディアークという「星の意志」を創ることで、
秩序と平穏を取り戻した。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000240_EMETSELCH<tab>Ere long, however, thankless fools began to fear that Zodiark's might was too great. And so they conjured another to keep Him in check─your own dear Hydaelyn.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000240_EMETSELCHだが、恩知らずにも、
強大なゾディアークを残しておくべきではないと語る者が現れ、
枷としてハイデリンを創りだした。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000250_YSHTOLA<tab>And the two beings waged war until, with a single, devastating blow, Hydaelyn unmade Zodiark, scattering his being across space and time. So you told us in the Qitana Ravel.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000250_YSHTOLAそして二者は争い、ハイデリンの一撃によって、
ゾディアークは分かたれて封印された……
キタンナ神影洞で、あなたはそう言っていたわね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000260_EMETSELCH<tab>Yes, yes... And <var 1A 02 /var>there<var 1A 01 /var> began our woes─with Hydaelyn's blow, and all that it wrought.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000260_EMETSELCHああ……。
問題はその、ハイデリンの一撃だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000270_EMETSELCH<tab>As a counterbalance to Zodiark, Hydaelyn was created with the power to enervate Her foe.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000270_EMETSELCH枷として創られたあいつは、
力を削ぎ落すことに関して、破格の能力を持つ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000280_EMETSELCH<tab>This singular ability strikes not at such banal things as flesh, but <var 1A 02 /var>everything<var 1A 01 /var> that defines the target, diluting its existence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000280_EMETSELCHその渾身の一撃ともなれば、身を裂くなんて単純な話じゃない。
……存在そのものを切り刻むという、離れ業だった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000290_EMETSELCH<tab>For example, were She to strike you...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000290_EMETSELCH例えば、お前がその技を受けたとする。
すると、お前が2人に分かたれる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000300_EMETSELCH<tab>Two individuals, identical in appearance, yet reduced in all respects. Strength, intelligence, the soul itself─all is halved.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000300_EMETSELCH見た目はそっくりお前のまま。
しかし、ひとつひとつを構成する要素は薄くなっている……
力も、知能も、魂も、なにもかも半分ずつだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000310_EMETSELCH<tab>Do you see? This selfsame fate befell not only Zodiark, but the very star.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000310_EMETSELCHそれと同じことが、
ゾディアークを含め、この星全体に起きた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000320_EMETSELCH<tab>Only three were fortunate enough to escape the sundering─me being one of them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000320_EMETSELCHあの一撃を逃れたのは、たったの3人……
オリジナルのアシエンたる、私たちだけだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000330_EMETSELCH<tab>When I beheld the shattered remnants of our home, I knew deepest despair.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000330_EMETSELCH<tab>14に分かたれた世界を見たときは、絶句したよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000340_EMETSELCH<tab>The inhabitants of these fourteen fragments were feeble, frail, and foolish. Oblivious to their imperfection, ignorant of their past.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000340_EMETSELCH生命はどれも、弱く、脆く、愚かになっていた。
しかも、その不完全な状態のまま、
それぞれに固有の歴史を歩みはじめたじゃないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000350_EMETSELCH<tab>Malformed creatures thrashing blindly about. Pitiful. Disturbing. Depressing.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000350_EMETSELCH私たちに言わせれば、
得体の知れない「なりそこない」が蠢いている状態だぞ？
不気味でないわけがない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000360_EMETSELCH<tab>So we took it upon ourselves to rejoin the worlds. But in our eagerness─and, I confess, our ignorance─we erred, and made a useless void of the Thirteenth.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000360_EMETSELCHそこで世界の再統合を試みたが、
強引に遂げようとした第十三世界は、壊れてゴミに。
お前たちの言う、ヴォイドの誕生だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000370_EMETSELCH<tab>It was only afterwards that we discovered a connection 'twixt Source and shard─a flow of energy that maintains elemental balance. And thus did we arrive at our time-honored modus operandi.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000370_EMETSELCHその後、原初世界と鏡像世界の繋がり……
属性を均一にしようとする力の流れを発見したことで、
今の方式が確立されたというわけだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000380_YSHTOLA<tab>From a purely Ascian standpoint, it could be said that what you seek to do is only logical.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000380_YSHTOLA……なるほどね。
あなたの視点で見れば、アシエンがしようとしていることは、
当然の行動のようにも思えるわ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000390_YSHTOLA<tab>But that would be to ignore the immeasurable destruction wrought with each Rejoining. You have murdered millions. And this we cannot condone.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000390_YSHTOLAでも実際は、統合のたびに多くの犠牲が出ている。
それを無視して賛同なんて、できなくてよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000400_EMETSELCH<tab>By your fragmented existence, you continue to give rise to tragedies far crueler than any calamity.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000400_EMETSELCHよく言う……不完全なまま生きるがゆえに、
霊災よりも酷な悲劇を生み続けてるだろうに。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000410_EMETSELCH<tab>But yes, moral relativism and all that. Case in point─I do not consider you to be truly alive. Ergo, I will not be guilty of murder if I kill you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000410_EMETSELCHしかし、それこそ視点の違いだな。
犠牲も何も、統合されていない不完全な命を、
私は到底「生きている」とは思えない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000420_EMETSELCH<tab>Oh, don't look at me like that. You for whom I have only the highest expectations.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000420_EMETSELCHそんな顔するな。
だからこそ、私はお前に期待してるんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000430_EMETSELCH<tab>A vaunted hero of the Source, seven times rejoined.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000430_EMETSELCH7回は統合された、原初世界の命。
中でもとくに優れた英雄なら、少しはマシかもしれない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000440_EMETSELCH<tab>Long have I awaited one who might brave a path of lesser tragedy. A resilient soul able to endure the necessary pain. I dare to hope that my wait is over.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000440_EMETSELCH……私はそろそろ見つけたいんだ。
今ひとときの痛みに耐えてでも、より悲劇の少ない道を選べる、
そんな強さを持つ相手を。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000450_EMETSELCH<tab>So, finish your task and slay the Lightwarden. Make proof of your usefulness. And then we may speak again.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000450_EMETSELCHそのためにも、罪喰い討伐くらいやり遂げて見せろ。
お前たちは弱くない……そう証を立てることが、
この話を続ける最低条件だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000460_LYNA<tab>Forgive me, my lord, but this could not wait.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000460_LYNAお取込み中、失礼します……！
水晶公、急ぎのご報告が。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000470_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Speak freely, Captain.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000470_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>構わない、皆に伝えてくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000480_LYNA<tab>Our informant in Kholusia sends word of unusual activity in Eulmore.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000480_LYNAコルシア島に潜伏中の協力者から、連絡がありました。
ユールモアに、常ならぬ動きがあるようです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000490_LYNA<tab>It appears their forces are entrenching themselves at key points throughout the city. Making ready for an attack, by all indications.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000490_LYNA詳細は掴めていませんが、
かの軍は都市内に集結し、防備を固めている様子。
こちらを迎え撃つ気かもしれません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000500_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>An intriguing use of resources. I rather doubt Lord Vauthry is concerned for the safety of his citizens...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000500_MYSTERYVOICE都市の護りに重点を置いたか。
まず市民の安全を優先したという見方もできるが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000510_ALISAIE<tab>You think he's harboring the Lightwarden <var 1A 02 /var>inside<var 1A 01 /var> the city walls? Even if he does have some means of controlling the sin eaters, wouldn't that be a little risky?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000510_ALISAIEヴァウスリーがどこまでの罪喰いを操れるか知らないけど、
大罪喰いを匿ってる可能性もあるんじゃない？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000520_THANCRED<tab>Risky or not, if there is even a chance the Warden is hiding there, we will need to act fast. The longer we wait, the better prepared the Eulmorans will be.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000520_THANCRED何にせよ、時間がたつほど、あちらの準備は万全になる。
罪喰い討伐に乗り出すなら、早い方がいい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000530_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Agreed. See to your preparations then, and make for Kholusia.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000530_MYSTERYVOICEでは、皆、準備を整えてコルシア島へ。
ユールモアの状況を探るところから、行動を開始してほしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000540_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Gods willing, this hunt will be the last. Let us see it through to the end.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000540_MYSTERYVOICEこれが最後の大罪喰い討伐になるだろう……
必ず無事にやり遂げるんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000550_ALPHINAUD<tab>We should begin by assembling in Wright. There we may assess the situation in Eulmore, and decide how best to proceed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000550_ALPHINAUDひとまず、「ライト村」で落ち合うことにしよう。
ユールモアに近づくのは、状況を確認してからの方がいい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000560_URIANGER<tab>Strange. Passing strange...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000560_URIANGER<tab>……この状況、どうにも不可解です。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000570_URIANGER<tab>By their behavior, we may safely assume that they are under Vauthry's mind control.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000570_URIANGER異様な行動をとっている住民たちは、
皆、夢うつつの状態ながらも、ヴァウスリーを讃えている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000580_URIANGER<tab>Yet the extent of the effect seemeth to vary dramatically between subjects.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000580_URIANGERこのことから、彼らがヴァウスリーの繰る魅了……
精神支配の術にかかっていると見て、間違いはないでしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000590_URIANGER<tab>'Tis far too pronounced to be attributed simply to the vagaries of innate magical resistance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000590_URIANGERしかし、かかり方に差がありすぎる……。
確かに魔法への耐性は個人差がありますが、これほどには……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000600_ALPHINAUD<tab>Curiouser and curiouser...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000600_ALPHINAUD<tab>やはり、何か尋常じゃない事態になっているようだね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000610_ALPHINAUD<tab>We met with no trouble en route. My thanks for securing the way.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000610_ALPHINAUDありがとう、君が先行してくれたおかげで、
こちらは難なく近づいてこられた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000620_ALPHINAUD<tab>But given the state of the townsfolk, I see we were never in any danger of being recognized.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000620_ALPHINAUD……もっとも、この様子では、
気づかれることを警戒する必要もなかったのかもしれないが。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000630_THANCRED<tab>What can you tell us from here?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000630_THANCRED<tab>大罪喰いの気配はどうだ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000640_RYNE<tab>I sense a powerful eater...in the uppermost reaches of the city...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000640_RYNE……ユールモアの最上階あたりに、
かなり強大な罪喰いがいるのを感じます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000650_RYNE<tab>But there's something different about it. Its Light is...impure.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000650_RYNEただ、大井戸のときと違って、なんだか異質な気配なんです。
純粋な罪喰いとはちがう……混ざり合ったみたいな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000660_RYNE<tab>We need to get closer.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000660_RYNE<tab>あれが大罪喰いかどうかは、もう少し近づいてみないと……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000670_KAISHIRR<tab>(-???-)Ohhh! So <var 1A 02 /var>that one's<var 1A 01 /var> Alphinaud! ...Unless you're triplets?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000670_KAISHIRR(-？？？？-)あっ……！
今度こそ、アルフィノさん……か？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000680_ALPHINAUD<tab>Kai-Shirr! What are you doing here?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000680_ALPHINAUDカイ・シル！
君、どうしてまだこんなところに！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000690_ALISAIE<tab>While I was scouting the area, I noticed a suspicious figure skulking about.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000690_ALISAIE見回ってたら、ゲートタウンの様子を窺ってる、
怪しい奴がいたのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000700_ALISAIE<tab>So I accosted him─only to have him call me “Alphinaud.” I thought it best to bring him along.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000700_ALISAIEそれで声をかけてみたら……
よりにもよって「アルフィノさん？」とか言うもんだから、
とりあえず連れてきたわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000710_KAISHIRR<tab>You see...that informant who's been feeding secrets to the Crystarium...it's me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000710_KAISHIRR<tab>あの……実は、クリスタリウムに情報を投げたのは俺なんです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000720_KAISHIRR<tab>See, after you saved my life in Eulmore, I thought about going somewhere far away. But I couldn't just leave, not without paying you back.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000720_KAISHIRRユールモアから逃がしてもらったあと、
よそに行くことも考えました。
でも、仕切り直す前に、恩を返したいと思って……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000730_KAISHIRR<tab>So I decided to stay here─keep an eye on things. And whenever I spotted something strange, I shared it with your friends.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000730_KAISHIRRコルシア島なら、慣れてるから隠れて暮らすこともできます。
それで潜伏しながら、ユールモアについての情報を、
クリスタリウムに……アルフィノさんたちに送ろうって。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000740_ALPHINAUD<tab>That took no small amount of courage. Well done.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000740_ALPHINAUDそうだったのか……！
君の勇気に、感謝しなければいけないね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000750_THANCRED<tab>I assume you saw what happened here.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000750_THANCREDということは、お前はこの集落を見ていたんだな。
異変が起こった経緯も？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000760_KAISHIRR<tab>Right, so, an airship flew in a bit ago, and not long after, Vauthry starts ranting and raving. You could hear him from all the way out here!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000760_KAISHIRR少し前、飛空艇がユールモアに戻ってきました。
そしたら、ヴァウスリーが、
ここまで聞こえるような声で騒ぎ出して。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000770_KAISHIRR<tab>Geezer was doing his nut! Shouting and screaming like someone had nicked his pie!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000770_KAISHIRR「役立たず！」とか、そんなことを言っていた気がします。
とにかく、とても怒っているようでした。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000780_URIANGER<tab>'Tis like the airship bore the soldiers sent to thwart our efforts in Amh Araeng.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000780_URIANGER……恐らく、その飛空艇は軍を乗せていたのでしょう。
アム・アレーンの大罪喰いを倒されたことについて、
立腹したのではないかと思われます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000790_KAISHIRR<tab>So eventually the yelling dies down...and then this hot, sticky wind comes blowing through.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000790_KAISHIRRその怒鳴り声が収まったあと、何か……
温かい風みたいなものが吹いたんです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000800_KAISHIRR<tab>Now that's when everyone went funny. Everyone but me. Well, me and a couple of newcomers, though even they started mumbling about Vauthry after a while. Not as bad as the rest, mind you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000800_KAISHIRRそのあとから、一部の人の様子が……。
俺の知るかぎりでは、昔からここにいる人のほうが、
変になってる気がします。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000810_URIANGER<tab>Newcomers...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000810_URIANGER<tab>ふむ……古参の者から……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000820_YSHTOLA<tab>There's something I need Ryne to see.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000820_YSHTOLAちょっといいかしら？
気になるものを見つけたから、リーンにも視てもらいたいの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000830_YSHTOLA<tab>This was among the townsfolk's food stores.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000830_YSHTOLA<tab>ここの住民たちの食料だそうよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000840_KAISHIRR<tab>Oh, that's just meol. Eulmore doles the stuff out.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000840_KAISHIRRそれ、メオルですよね……？
ユールモアから配給されてる……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000850_RYNE<tab>No! It...it couldn't be...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000850_RYNE<tab>まさか……こんなことって……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000860_RYNE<tab>I─ I know what it is.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000860_RYNE<tab>今なら、わかります……これは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000870_RYNE<tab>It's sin eater. Meol is made out of sin eater.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000870_RYNEこれは、罪喰いです。
罪喰いの……身体です……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000880_YSHTOLA<tab>So it is.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000880_YSHTOLA<tab>……やっぱりね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000890_YSHTOLA<tab>In limited quantities, it may have little effect on an average individual.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000890_YSHTOLAこれを口にしたところで、
正常な人なら、自浄作用が働いて罪喰いにはならない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000900_YSHTOLA<tab>Yet if one were to consume it regularly, over a period of several years, I suspect it would do far, far more than merely nourish the body...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000900_YSHTOLAそれでも、長年繰り返していれば、
その身に影響が残ることもあるでしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000910_URIANGER<tab>That Vauthry wieldeth power over sin eaters is known. Could it be that those who partake of their flesh do thereby render themselves susceptible to his influence?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000910_URIANGERヴァウスリーが罪喰いに命令できるならば、
罪喰いに近づいてしまった者もまた、
彼に従いやすくなるのかもしれません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000920_URIANGER<tab>'Twould serve to explain why the town's newer arrivals succumbed less quickly than those raised on a diet of meol.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000920_URIANGERそれであれば……
メオルを食べてきた古参の者から異常をきたすのも、頷けます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000930_ALISAIE<tab>He's been rounding up sin eaters and feeding them to people!? Altering them mouthful by mouthful─all to stop them answering back!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000930_ALISAIE何よ……何よそれ……！
罪喰いを呼び集めて、食料として配ってたってこと！？
いつか体がおかしくなっちゃうかもしれないのに！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000940_ALISAIE<tab>There are desperate souls out there <var 1A 02 /var>killing<var 1A 01 /var> themselves to escape turning! This is unforgivable! An atrocity!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000940_ALISAIEそんなの、どうかしてる……！
罪喰いになりかけて、仕方なく命を絶った人だっている。
なのに……っ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000950_ALPHINAUD<tab>These sin eaters... What if they are not simply “rounded up”?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000950_ALPHINAUD罪喰いを「呼び集めて」……
どうかそうであってほしいと、心から願うよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000960_ALPHINAUD<tab>Do you remember what we were told when first we came to the city?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000960_ALPHINAUDユールモアに潜入したときに聞いた話を覚えているかい。
君が、くすり師から聞いたという言葉だ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000970_ALPHINAUD<tab>"Many enter, but none leave...“
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000970_ALPHINAUDあの街には、多くの者が招かれる。
だが、出ていく者は…………

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000980_ALPHINAUD<tab>Let us put an end to it. To this “paradise” built upon the bones of the poor.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000980_ALPHINAUD終わりにしよう。
数多の犠牲の上に築かれた、ヴァウスリーの楽園を。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000990_ALPHINAUD<tab>Vauthry's deeds are beyond justification. Beyond forgiveness. Evil.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_000990_ALPHINAUD動機に一縷の理があったとしても、
生きとし生ける者の尊厳をもって、彼の行いは許しがたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001000_THANCRED<tab>It's highly probable that the Lightwarden is waiting for us somewhere in there, and I'm all for going after it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001000_THANCRED大罪喰いの候補も都市内にいるんだ、突入には賛成しよう。
ただ、ユールモアの強みは、入口が限られていることにある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001010_THANCRED<tab>But our enemies know our faces. They know that we are coming. And they will not let us through without a fight. Like it or not, the time for stealth is passed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001010_THANCREDこちらの顔も割れているとなると、秘密裏に侵入は難しい……
正面きっての対決にならざるを得ないだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001020_THANCRED<tab>Now, my friend. If you would be so good as to lead the charge.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001020_THANCREDだから、お前が号令を。
それにあわせて、全員で突入だ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001030_VAUTHRY<tab>Ugh... I can feel it... A dark presence in my domain!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001030_VAUTHRYンン……感じる、感じるゾ……！
私の人形ではない者が、この楽園に踏み込んでいル……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001040_VAUTHRY<tab>Ah! It's them! The villains who would sow chaos in my perfect paradise!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001040_VAUTHRYアアァ……あいつらダ……！
また私を邪魔しにきた、混沌を引き連れて！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001050_VAUTHRY<tab>Keep them away from me! I command you, keep them awaaaaaay!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001050_VAUTHRY嫌ダ……嫌ダ嫌ダ嫌ダ嫌ダッ！
あいつらを、もう私に近づけるナァァァッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001060_PUPPETMAN<tab>Long live...Lord Vauthry...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001060_PUPPETMAN<tab>ドン、ヴァウスリー……万歳……ばんざイ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001070_THANCRED<tab>He would use his own people as shields.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001070_THANCRED……なるほど。
敗北続きの軍だけじゃなく、市民まで盾にして自分を護るか。
見下げ果てた根性だな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001080_ALPHINAUD<tab>This area is older than Gatetown. There are bound to be far more civilians under Vauthry's control.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001080_ALPHINAUDここ廃船街は、ゲートタウンよりも古い。
ヴァウスリーに操られる者の数も、ずっと多いはずだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001090_ALPHINAUD<tab>But they do not act of their own free will, and we must not harm them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001090_ALPHINAUDだが、彼ら自身の意志で戦っていないなら……
できるだけ、傷つけずにすませたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001100_ALISAIE<tab>As if we ever would.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001100_ALISAIE<tab>ほら、絶対そう言うと思ってた！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001110_ALISAIE<tab>Press on with Alphinaud. We'll hold off the civilians and join you as soon as we can.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001110_ALISAIEあなたとアルフィノは、とにかく都市の上を目指して。
私たちは市民たちを抑えながら、援護にまわるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001120_RANJIT<tab>You will find my master in his chamber...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001120_RANJIT<tab>……我が主ならば、変わらず頂上の執務室よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001130_RANJIT<tab>But only should you kill me this day─and you will not.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001130_RANJITそこが主の、最後の楽園。
なれば臣下は命を懸けて、それを護らねばならぬ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Why do you go so far?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>どうして、そこまで……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>You're one of his puppets too.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>お前も操られているのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001140_RANJIT<tab>You may think me under his spell, but I uphold Lord Vauthry's ideals of my own volition.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001140_RANJIT格別な理由も、妖術も不要。
我はただ、ヴァウスリーの掲げた理想を善しとしたのみ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001150_RANJIT<tab>Man is an inherently flawed creature. In his vain pursuit of righteousness, he but sows the seeds of future conflict.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001150_RANJIT人は、人であるかぎり……
そして、正しく在ろうとするほどに、戦から逃れられぬ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001160_RANJIT<tab>Thus have I chosen to place my hopes upon he who has transcended men. Upon he who is unbound by the vagaries of conscience.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001160_RANJITなればこそ。
正しくなく、ただの人でもない……
そんな男の掲げる平和に賭けたのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001170_RANJIT<tab>But enough talk. I am a soldier, and you are my enemy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001170_RANJIT我はユールモアの理想に殉ずる一兵。
貴様は、相対する反逆者。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001180_RANJIT<tab>Come! Let us settle this once and for all!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001180_RANJIT<tab>構えよ、いざ決着をつけようぞ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001190_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lord Vauthry! Your reign of tyranny is at an end.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001190_ALPHINAUD辿り着いたぞ……！
観念するんだ、ドン・ヴァウスリー！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001200_ALPHINAUD<tab>For too long, you have preyed upon the desperation of the poor. Now you will answer for the suffering you have caused!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001200_ALPHINAUDノルヴラントは、もはやお前を戴くことはない。
これまで欺き、愚弄してきた人々に、心からの贖罪を。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001210_ALPHINAUD<tab>And if you harbor even a shred of remorse, I beseech you to use your powers to redress the balance. For the future of all in Norvrandt.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001210_ALPHINAUDそして……願わくば、今度こそ。
人を信じ、皆が未来に進むために、その力を使ってほしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001220_RYNE<tab>No... It can't be. This is wrong. It's <var 1A 02 /var>wrong<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001220_RYNE違います、アルフィノさん……。
彼は……違うんです……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001230_RYNE<tab>The Warden─it's not just a sin eater. It's a man!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001230_RYNE人だけど、人じゃない……。
大罪喰いの気配が、混じっています！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001240_VAUTHRY<tab>Remorse? For the future of all? What nonsense is this?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001240_VAUTHRYショクザイ？　ミンナ？　未来？
何を、ナニヲ、何を言っているのだネ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001250_VAUTHRY<tab>There is no justice but mine. No future but mine. No will but mine.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001250_VAUTHRY私は秩序、私はルール、私だけが絶対の正義。
私は人を統べ、罪喰いを統べル……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001260_VAUTHRY<tab>It is preordained. I was born to deliver this wretched world.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001260_VAUTHRY全部、最初から決まっていたことダ。
世界は、私に救われるために、こういう形にできていル。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001270_VAUTHRY<tab>Me? Unseated? No, no, no, no, no...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001270_VAUTHRYだから、上手くいかないことなんて、あるはずがなイ。
私が、オ、おい、追い詰められる……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001280_VAUTHRY<tab>It's impossible. Inconceivable! <var 1A 02 /var>Absurd<var 1A 01 /var>! I am a great and wise king. Greatest and wisest! I reign from on high!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001280_VAUTHRYナイ、必要ナイ、理由がない、罪などなイッ！
私は愚かなヒトを導いてやる、誰より正しく利口な王ダ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001290_VAUTHRY<tab>I will not be brought low by maggots like you!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001290_VAUTHRYこんな下賤なクズどもにィィ！
侵されていいわけがないィィィィッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001300_VAUTHRY<tab>(SCREAM)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001300_VAUTHRY<tab>アァァァッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001310_VAUTHRY<tab>Oh, yes. Of course. I can begin again. Rebuild my paradise. Once I finish my dinner...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001310_VAUTHRYそうダ、やり直さなくては。
創り直さなくては……私の楽園ヲ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001320_RYNE<tab>Oh gods, no─ Stop him! Thancred, stop him!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001320_RYNEッ……いけない！
彼を止めて、サンクレッド！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001330_ALPHINAUD<tab>Where did he go!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001330_ALPHINAUD<tab>ヴァウスリーは……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001340_ALPHINAUD<tab>What in the heavens!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001340_ALPHINAUD<tab>山が……浮いている……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001350_ALISAIE<tab>Did Vauthry do that?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001350_ALISAIE<tab>何よあれ、ヴァウスリーがやったっていうの……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>We must give chase!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>すぐにヴァウスリーを追おう！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>How will we get up there?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>あの山への行き方は！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001360_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wait.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001360_ALPHINAUD<tab>待ってくれ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001370_ALPHINAUD<tab>That is Mt. Gulg, the highest peak in Kholusia. It lies on the other side of a sheer cliff, and much as I wish it were otherwise, it is beyond our reach for now.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001370_ALPHINAUDあれは、コルシア島の最高峰……グルグ火山。
断崖の先にあるから、焦って向かっても辿りつけない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001380_ALPHINAUD<tab>But even if it weren't─there are people here who need our help.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001380_ALPHINAUDだから……まず、この街の……
ユールモアの民を、助けさせてはくれないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001390_ALISAIE<tab>Oh, Alphinaud...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001390_ALISAIE<tab>アルフィノ……あなた……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001400_ALPHINAUD<tab>Please. Even if it's only to tend to their wounds.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001400_ALPHINAUD頼む……！
戦いに巻き込まれた人の、応急処置だけでも構わない！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'll help too.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>自分も手伝おう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>You don't need my permission.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>拒む理由はない

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A3_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Be quick about it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A3_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>できるだけ急げ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001410_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thank you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001410_ALPHINAUD<tab>ありがとう……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001420_RYNE<tab>I don't know if it will work, but if Vauthry's hold over the people is rooted in Light, I might be able to reverse its effects.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001420_RYNEやってみないとわかりませんが、
ヴァウスリーの精神干渉が、罪喰いとしての……
光の力によるものならば、私でも解除できるかもしれません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001430_RYNE<tab>Will you let me try?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001430_RYNE<tab>お手伝いさせてもらっていいですか……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001440_ALPHINAUD<tab>Of course. We'd be grateful for any help you can provide.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001440_ALPHINAUD<tab>もちろんだとも、頼りにさせてもらうよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001450_ALISAIE<tab>Well then, if it's decided, let's all get to work.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001450_ALISAIEそうと決まれば、パパッと手当していきましょ！
襲ってきた人たち、多分まだ下で転がってるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001460_RYNE<tab>You're going to be all right.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001460_RYNE<tab>ふぅ……これでもう大丈夫……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001470_ALISAIE<tab>I think that's the last of them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001470_ALISAIE<tab>おつかれさま、その人で最後のはずよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001480_ALPHINAUD<tab>We've done all we can for the wounded.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001480_ALPHINAUD怪我の手当も終わった。
私たちにできることは、ひととおりやり尽くしたよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001490_ALPHINAUD<tab>As for the rest...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001490_ALPHINAUD<tab>あとは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001500_DULIACHAI<tab>U-Um...a-aren't you Alphinaud? The painter boy?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001500_DULIACHAIあの……あなた、アルフィノちゃんでしょう……？
前に絵を描いてくれた……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001510_DULIACHAI<tab>What in the world is going on? Did something happen to us?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001510_DULIACHAIいったい、何がどうなっているの？
私たちは、どうなってしまったの……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001520_ALPHINAUD<tab>Let me handle this.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001520_ALPHINAUD<tab>ここは、私に任せてほしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001530_ALPHINAUD<tab>Citizens of Eulmore. What I'm about to tell you will come as a shock.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001530_ALPHINAUD<tab>これから話すことは、あなた方にとって衝撃だろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001540_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed, you may be loath to believe it. But if you trust the evidence of your senses, it is my hope that you will listen and accept the truth, unpalatable though it may be.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001540_ALPHINAUDだが、事実として、あなた方は今この現場にいる。
だからこそ受け止めてくれると信じて、真相を語りたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001550_ALPHINAUD<tab>Vauthry is a sin eater. Everything he offered, everything he promised, was a lie...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001550_ALPHINAUD……ドン・ヴァウスリーは、大罪喰いだった。
彼がもたらす、メオルという無尽蔵の食料も、
魂の救済も、すべては欺瞞だったのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001560_ALISAIE<tab>They're not taking it well. And who could blame them?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001560_ALISAIE<tab>……さすがに、しんどそうね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001570_EULMOREPEOPLEA<tab>Are you saying we were Vauthry's puppets all this time?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001570_EULMOREPEOPLEA<tab>では、私たちはずっと、ヴァウスリーに操られていたのですか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001580_ALPHINAUD<tab>When you attacked us, you were not yourselves. That much is true.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001580_ALPHINAUD少なくとも、先ほど私たちに襲い掛かってきたときは、
意識のない彼の傀儡になっていただろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001590_ALPHINAUD<tab>But your conduct prior to that moment was your own. Vauthry's unnatural charisma does not absolve you of all responsibility.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001590_ALPHINAUDしかし、それ以前のことは……
ヴァウスリーへの評価こそ不自然なものがあったにせよ、
自身の行いを、自身のものとして記憶しているのでは？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001600_ALPHINAUD<tab>Of your own free will, you came to this city and gave yourselves over to its pleasures.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001600_ALPHINAUDこの都に足を踏み入れ、享楽を貪ったのは、
間違いなくあなた方だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001610_ALPHINAUD<tab>And in the course of this, if you mistreated those less fortunate than you...then that too was of your own free will.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001610_ALPHINAUDその過程で、持たざる者を足蹴にしたとしたら、
それはあなたの意志によるものだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001620_ALPHINAUD<tab>It is not for me to judge you, but for your victims. For history. For your conscience.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001620_ALPHINAUD……その是非を問うのは私ではない。
あなた自身の良心であり、あなたが虐げた者であり、
これからの歴史だろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001630_ALPHINAUD<tab>You have dreamed a twisted dream, but now you are awake.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001630_ALPHINAUD<tab>あなた方の、熟れた夢は終わった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001640_ALPHINAUD<tab>You may yet share this world of ours. Join with us and each other that we might begin anew.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001640_ALPHINAUD……それでも私は、あなた方に生きてほしいと願う。
ここからまた、歩き出してほしいとも。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001650_ALPHINAUD<tab>We've lost so many already. We dare not lose any more.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001650_ALPHINAUD<tab>この世界はもう……誰も、失うべきじゃないんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001660_ALPHINAUD<tab>I have said my piece. My thanks for giving me the chance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001660_ALPHINAUD伝えるべきことは伝えたよ。
時間をくれて、ありがとう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001670_ALPHINAUD<tab>There is nothing more to be done here. Let us go after Vauthry.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001670_ALPHINAUDさあ、もうここに留まる理由もない。
ヴァウスリーを追いかけに行こう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001680_EULMOREPEOPLEB<tab>Is there anything we can do to help?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001680_EULMOREPEOPLEB<tab>……私たちに、何かできることはあるか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001690_EULMOREPEOPLEB<tab>You risked your lives to bring us to our senses, a-and I for one hope to repay that debt. Begin anew, as you said.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001690_EULMOREPEOPLEB命を懸けて真実を明らかにしてくれた君たちに、
少しでも報いることができるなら……
まずはそこから、はじめたいんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001700_YSHTOLA<tab>Vauthry has fled to Mt. Gulg, and we mean to pursue him. Do any of you know the way?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001700_YSHTOLA私たち、ヴァウスリーを追って、グルグ火山に行きたいの。
誰か道を知らないかしら？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001710_EULMOREPEOPLEC<tab>The only way to Mt. Gulg is over the Bright Cliff. Have you an airship?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001710_EULMOREPEOPLECあの山に近づくには、ブライトクリフ断崖を越えるしかない。
飛空艇に乗るのはどうだろうか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001720_YSHTOLA<tab>We will contemplate flight only as a last resort. Were we to come under attack whilst airborne, we would have little hope of defending ourselves.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001720_YSHTOLA悪くない提案だけれど……飛ぶのは極力避けたいわ。
空中で攻撃を受けたら、一網打尽にされかねないもの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001730_YSHTOLA<tab>If at all possible, we would prefer to travel by land. Is there a way?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001730_YSHTOLA<tab>安全を図るなら、地上から近づきたいところね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001740_EULMOREPEOPLED<tab>The Ladder is the only way up and down the cliff, but it hasn't moved in a long time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001740_EULMOREPEOPLED<tab>断崖の上には、採掘を生業とする一族が暮らしていたの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001750_EULMOREPEOPLED<tab>In the old days, it was operated by the mining folk who lived at the top.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001750_EULMOREPEOPLED昔は彼らと交易をしていたのだけれど、「光の氾濫」以降、
取引は減る一方だったと聞いたことがあるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001760_EULMOREPEOPLED<tab>But after the Flood it saw less and less use, and when Lord Vauthry took control, it was abandoned altogether.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001760_EULMOREPEOPLEDヴァウスリーが元首となってからは、
断崖の上下を繋ぐ「ラダー大昇降機」さえ、
動かしたことがなかったはずよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001770_ALISAIE<tab>So we somehow need to get the Ladder working again?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001770_ALISAIE<tab>なら、その大昇降機っていうのを動かす方法はないの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001780_EULMOREPEOPLEC<tab>It moves by means of a Talos, if that's any help. But good luck repairing that...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001780_EULMOREPEOPLECあれは、専用のタロースが装置を操る仕組みだったはず。
だから、まずはそいつを復活させないことには……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001790_DULIACHAI<tab>...Talos? Did someone say Talos!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001790_DULIACHAI…………タロース？
今、タロースを動かしたいっておっしゃったかしら？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001800_DULIACHAI<tab>You know all about them, don't you, dearest! If anyone can get this lift moving, it's you!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001800_DULIACHAIねぇあなた、そうよね？
タロースを動かせばいいって、そういうお話よね？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001810_CHAINUZZ<tab>Um...well...perhaps. B-B-But see here─
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001810_CHAINUZZうむ……まあ、その、多分……。
いやしかしだな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001820_DULIACHAI<tab>Oh, yes! If you want the golem restored, you may leave it to my husband!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001820_DULIACHAIはい、はいは～い！
タロースを動かすことなら、任せてちょうだい！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001830_DULIACHAI<tab>For he happens to be the heir to Daedalus Stoneworks, foremost makers of Talos, whose contracts include the renowned mining venture of Amh Araeng!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001830_DULIACHAI私の旦那様は、アム・アレーンの鉱山開発も担った、
タロース操業の大家……ダイダロス社の跡取りなんだから～！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001840_CHAINUZZ<tab>It's... Well, i-i-it's been years and years since I had anything to do with it! I-I can't just pick up a hammer and set to work!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001840_CHAINUZZいやいやいやいや、もう何年もやってないんだ。
できるかどうか、怪しいもので……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001850_DULIACHAI<tab>You...you can't?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001850_DULIACHAI<tab>で、できないの……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001860_CHAINUZZ<tab>N-No, th-th-that's not what I─ I-It's just, I─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001860_CHAINUZZ<tab>いや、そういう、わけでも……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001870_CHAINUZZ<tab>...All right, I will take a look at the Talos, but beyond that, I make no promises!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001870_CHAINUZZ……み、見てみるだけだからな！
期待はするな、文句もなしだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001880_CHAINUZZ<tab>Those with strong backs, come with me. I'll need help dragging the damned thing out of the storehouse...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001880_CHAINUZZおい、誰か一緒に来てくれ。
昇降機用のタロースは、倉庫に仕舞われてたはずだ。
引きずり出すには、人手がいる！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001890_ALISAIE<tab>Well done, Brother.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001890_ALISAIE<tab>よかったわね、アルフィノ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001900_ALPHINAUD<tab>Come, my friend. We have work to do!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001900_ALPHINAUD<tab>私たちも、行ってみよう！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001910_EMETSELCH<tab>Would you look at that? The citizens of Eulmore engaging in what can only be described as “manual labor.” Who would have thought it possible?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001910_EMETSELCHおおぅ……ユールモアの市民が働いている……。
これはまた、ずいぶんと勢いよく掌を返したな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001920_EMETSELCH<tab>Do you know the most reliable way to deal with those who stubbornly refuse to see reason?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001920_EMETSELCHどうあっても意見が異なる……いくら話しても納得できない……
そんな相手との決着のつけ方を、知ってるか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001930_EMETSELCH<tab>You conquer them─crush them under heel. Such was the trusted method of Allag, and one still favored by Garlemald.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001930_EMETSELCH簡単なのは、力で打ちのめして、相手の主張を葬ることだ。
アラグでもガレマールでも、結局大勢はそれを支持したし、
事実、手っ取り早く繁栄をもたらした。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001940_EMETSELCH<tab>But conquest is the <var 1A 02 /var>easy<var 1A 01 /var> part. The true challenge begins once the dust has settled─quenching the glowing embers of animosity and maintaining a semblance of peace.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001940_EMETSELCH一方、戦いの末に、勝者の願いが優先されることになっても、
敗者もまた尊重され、ある種の和解に至ることがある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001950_EMETSELCH<tab>This requires the conqueror to treat the conquered with dignity, and the conquered to let bygones be bygones. A difficult feat to achieve.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001950_EMETSELCHそういう決着にもっていくのは、とても難しい……。
勝者が敗者を見下さず、憐れまず、敗者が勝者を仇としない。
その両方が必要だからだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001960_EMETSELCH<tab>But you have achieved just that...to my considerable surprise.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001960_EMETSELCH今回も、お前たちがユールモアに乗り込んだ時点では、
簡単な方に転がると思ったんだがな……まさかこうなるとは。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001970_EMETSELCH<tab>It's a compliment. Take it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001970_EMETSELCH<tab>……褒めてるんだよ、ありがたく受け取れ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001980_EMETSELCH<tab>Ahh, the vibrant energy that fills the air when like-minded souls gather. To think back on that time before time fair brings a tear to the eye.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001980_EMETSELCHしかしまあ、にぎやかなことだ……。
同志が集うと活気づくのは、私たちの時代から変わらないな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001990_EMETSELCH<tab>What? You thought ancient beings like us incapable of crying?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_001990_EMETSELCH<tab>なんだ、アシエンや古代人には、血も涙もないと思ったか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002000_EMETSELCH<tab>Well, rest assured that if <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> heart can be broken, then so can mine!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002000_EMETSELCH心外だ、お前たちが持ち得る感情を、
私たちが有していないわけがないだろう！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002010_EMETSELCH<tab>Back when the world was whole, we had family, friends, loves...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002010_EMETSELCH……普通にいたさ。
太古の昔、真なる世界に……家族も、友も、恋人だって。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002020_EMETSELCH<tab>Men knew peace and contentment, and with our adamant souls, we could live for an age.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002020_EMETSELCHいい世界だったんだ、穏やかで朗らかで……。
真なる人は頑強な魂を持ち、ほとんど永遠の時を生きられた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002030_EMETSELCH<tab>There was no conflict born of want or disparity. Our differences paled into insignificance next to all we had in common.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002030_EMETSELCHだから、余裕のなさから生じる、さもしい争いをしなかった。
ときに異なる意見を持ったとしても、同じ分だけ認め合えた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002040_EMETSELCH<tab>And then there was Amaurot... Never was a city more magnificent. From the humblest streets to the highest spires, she fairly gleamed...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002040_EMETSELCHアーモロートの街並みは壮麗で美しく、
高い塔のさらに上、遥かな空から日差しと風が注いでいた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002050_EMETSELCH<tab>Not that you would remember any of this.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002050_EMETSELCH……なんて。
言ったところで、思い出すわけもないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>“Remember”?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>……思い出す？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Is this story going anywhere?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>お前の妄言は聞かない

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002060_EMETSELCH<tab>Never mind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002060_EMETSELCH<tab>いいさ、忘れてくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002070_EMETSELCH<tab>The point is: the world of old was a far better place than what we have now. I believe you would like it, having witnessed the things you have.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002070_EMETSELCHだが、今よりずっといい世界だったのは本当だ。
この仕様もない世界で戦ってきたお前こそ、
案外、気に入ると思うぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002080_EMETSELCH<tab>Remember, you are of the Source. Unlike the halfmen here, you stand only to gain.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002080_EMETSELCH忘れるな。
お前は連中と違って、原初世界の住人……
統合される側ではなく、受け取る側の器だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002090_EMETSELCH<tab>Should you survive the remaining calamities, you will become our equal. A complete existence in a complete world.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002090_EMETSELCHすべての霊災を生き抜けば、私たちに近しい存在になり、
満ちた世界で暮らすことができる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002100_EMETSELCH<tab>But such talk is a pleasure for later. Back to work, hero.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002100_EMETSELCHおっと、この話は大罪喰い討伐が終わったあとだったな。
今はただ、お前の勝敗を見届けるとしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002110_EMETSELCH<tab>Ah, there was one thing I had meant to ask.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002110_EMETSELCH<tab>ああそうだ、ひとつだけ聞いておきたいことがあった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002120_EMETSELCH<tab>How well do you know the Exarch? Has he ever deigned to show you what hides beneath the cowl?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002120_EMETSELCH……お前、水晶公の素性をどこまで知ってる？
あのフードなしに、素顔で話したことは？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002130_EMETSELCH<tab>What, <var 1A 02 /var>never<var 1A 01 /var>? Even to you? How <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> interesting...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002130_EMETSELCHほう、お前にも明かしていない……か。
これはどう取るべきか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002140_EMETSELCH<tab>I shall enjoy working out what it means. Until next time.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002140_EMETSELCHまあ、謎解きの参考にさせてもらうとしよう。
では、またな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002150_DULIACHAI<tab>Ohhh, I knew you could do it, dearest! I never doubted you for a moment!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002150_DULIACHAIすごいわ、あなた！
ダイダロス社の名に恥じない、すばらしい偉業よ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002160_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>It's alive.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002160_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>タロース、動いたみたいだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002170_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>I don't know if you remember, but when we first met in this world, I was all but spent.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002170_WARRIOROFDARKNESS……なあ、お前とこっちで再会したとき、
俺は自分の形すら見失ってただろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002180_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>I never thought to wonder why until now.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002180_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>なんでああなったのか、ここのところ考えてたんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002190_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>I think it all just got to be too much.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002190_WARRIOROFDARKNESS多分……心なんてない方がいいと感じるほど、
打ちひしがれてた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002200_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>The guilt of causing the Flood... Knowing everyone hated me... But the worst thing was the solitude.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002200_WARRIOROFDARKNESS「光の氾濫」のこと、仲間が悪く言われること。
いろいろあったが、一番効いたのは……孤独だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002210_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Time wears you down, aye...but solitude <var 1A 02 /var>eats<var 1A 01 /var> away at you. It was <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> close to finishing me off. But as bad as it got, and as empty as I felt...I can't even begin to imagine what it must be like for Emet-Selch.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002210_WARRIOROFDARKNESS俺に言わせれば、そいつは時よりも人を追い詰める。
エメトセルクたちアシエンも、
あるいは蝕まれてるのかもしれない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002220_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>All of which is a long way of saying: don't make a choice that leaves you alone. Nothing is worth that─especially not eternity.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002220_WARRIOROFDARKNESSだから俺は、そばにいてくれる奴を失うような選択は勧めない。
永遠をもらえたって、わりにあうものか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002230_ALPHINAUD<tab>Glad tidings, my friend! The Ladder lives again!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002230_ALPHINAUD朗報だ！
ラダー大昇降機が、もう動かせそうなんだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002240_ALISAIE<tab>The three of us have been invited to do the honors. Are you <var 1A 02 /var>up<var 1A 01 /var> for it? Of course, if you're worried that the whole thing might come crashing <var 1A 02 /var>down<var 1A 01 /var>, we can always find someone else.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002240_ALISAIEそれで、まずはあなたと私たちで乗ったらどうかって。
久しぶりの運転になるわけだし、
心配だったら別の誰かに代わってもらうけど、どう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002250_ALISAIE<tab>That's the spirit! Come on, then!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002250_ALISAIEそうこなくっちゃ！
じゃあ、ほら、こっちに来て！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002260_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>We rode the Ladder too, my comrades and I. Once upon a time.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002260_WARRIOROFDARKNESSかつて自分も 仲間とともに
ラダー大昇降機に乗ったことがあった

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002270_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Watched the horizon grow and the town shrink below us...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002270_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>遠くに広がる水平線と 小さくなっていく眼下の街

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002280_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Awed and terrified in equal measure, we ascended without a word, the silence broken only by the rhythm of the gears.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002280_WARRIOROFDARKNESS感動と緊張が入り交じり 互いに言葉は少なく
昇降機の軋む音ばかりが響いていた

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002290_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>No one but me remembers that day.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002290_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>――それを記憶する者も 今は亡く

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002300_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Remembers our journey...and our end. Retread the path─seek and you may yet find...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002300_WARRIOROFDARKNESSあの日の旅は どこへ続いていたのだろう
答えを探しながら 再び断崖を昇っていく――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002310_ALISAIE<tab>You're a sight for sore eyes. I don't know about you, but I bumped into quite a few sin eaters out there.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002310_ALISAIE無事でよかった。
こっちは何度か罪喰いに襲われたから、
あなたの方もじゃないかって心配したわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002320_ALISAIE<tab>You too, then. It seems the closer we get to Mt. Gulg, the more of them there are.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002320_ALISAIEやっぱり、そっちにも罪喰いか……。
アミティーのあたりでは平気だったから、
グルグ火山に近づくほど、って感じかしら。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002330_ALISAIE<tab>Looks a lot bigger from here, doesn't it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002330_ALISAIE<tab>あの山……近くで見ると、一段と高く見えるわね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002340_ALISAIE<tab>If I were Vauthry, the first thing I'd do is surround myself with as many sin eaters as I could lay my hands on.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002340_ALISAIEあそこがヴァウスリーの根城になってるなら、
手先として罪喰いを呼び集めてるのは間違いない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002350_ALISAIE<tab>And judging by the number we've already faced, his lordship is of the same mind.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002350_ALISAIE地上にいる私たちまで目ざとく見つけてくるあたり、
かなりの数が防衛にあたってるんだわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002360_ALISAIE<tab>This is going to be a tough climb.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002360_ALISAIE<tab>登ったときには、どうなることか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002370_ALISAIE<tab>But first things first: we need to determine if climbing is even an option. The more I look, the less likely it seems...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002370_ALISAIEって言っても、登り方から考えないといけないみたい。
こうして近くから見ても、伝って行けそうな場所もないし。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002380_ALISAIE<tab>Y'shtola is right to be worried, but flying may be our only choice after all.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002380_ALISAIEヤ・シュトラの懸念はもっともだけど、
こうなったら飛空艇を使うしかないかしら……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002390_URIANGER<tab>There you are. Master Alphinaud was afeared you had met with some misfortune.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002390_URIANGER(-？？？？-)ああ、ここにいらっしゃいましたか。
アルフィノ様が、ご心配なさっていましたよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002400_ALISAIE<tab>Urianger! ...And you too, Exarch! What brings you here?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002400_ALISAIEウリエンジェ……それに水晶公！？
あなた、どうしてここに？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002410_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I wish to observe the final struggle with my own eyes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002410_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>最終決戦くらいは、自分の目で見届けたいと思ってね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002420_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I arrived at the Bottom Rung too late to accompany you, but I was in time to join Urianger and the others.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002420_MYSTERYVOICE先発のあなた方は去ったあとだったが、
大昇降機の下で、ウリエンジェたちと合流したのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002430_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Come, let us see how this unfolds.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002430_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>それよりも……ご覧。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002440_ALISAIE<tab>Well, it seems flying is off the table.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002440_ALISAIEなるほど、やっぱり空からの接近は厳しそうね。
翼がある罪喰いを相手に空中戦じゃ、
いくら私たちでも勝ち目が薄いわ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002450_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>If we have learned that much, then the machina have served their purpose.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002450_MYSTERYVOICEそれがわかってよかった。
あの兵器は塔内から持ち出した貴重な遺物……
収穫もなく潰されたのでは、面目ない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002460_ALISAIE<tab>Ah, so that's what they were for. Wasteful, but effective.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002460_ALISAIE……ああ、そういうこと。
私たちを探しがてら、あなたたちも調査に来てたのね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002470_URIANGER<tab>'Twould seem our foe will not be reached by land or air. We must needs withdraw to consider another course.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002470_URIANGERこれで、陸路はなく、空路も危険であると判明しました。
一度みなさんと合流し、対策を練りましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002480_URIANGER<tab>Master Alphinaud waiteth for us at Top Rung. Thither should we make our way.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002480_URIANGER後続組も、すでにトップラングに到着しています。
アルフィノ様にもそちらに戻っていただいたので、
我々も参りましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002490_THANCRED<tab>...In short, there's no path, and the sky is thick with Vauthry's winged devils.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002490_THANCRED……なるほどな。
地上からの道はなし、飛んでいこうにも罪喰いとの空中戦か。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002500_ALPHINAUD<tab>We might consider amaro, but without extensive training, we cannot hope to contend with the eaters.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002500_ALPHINAUD飛行可能なアマロを借りることはできるが……
何の訓練もなしに罪喰いと戦うのは、いかにも分が悪い。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002510_ALPHINAUD<tab>Eulmore's airship fleet, meanwhile, consists solely of transport vessels ill-suited for battle. And without the expertise of one such as Cid, we are in no position to attempt a refit.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002510_ALPHINAUDユールモアの飛空艇にしても、輸送用だから戦いには不向きだ。
シドがいてくれたら、改造という手もあったのだろうが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002520_DULIACHAI<tab>Oh, it's so <var 1A 02 /var>frustrating<var 1A 01 /var>! That wretched mountain should jolly well come back down to earth!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002520_DULIACHAIまあ、なんだか大変そうだわ。
お山が地面に戻ってくれればいいのにねぇ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002530_CHAINUZZ<tab>Now, now, dearest. We mustn't disturb these good people at their work.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002530_CHAINUZZ<tab>お、おい、邪魔しちゃダメだろう……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002540_CHAINUZZ<tab>We've ridden the Ladder and seen the sights. It's past time we took our leave.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002540_CHAINUZZ私たちは、昇降機を稼働させた記念に乗ってきただけの一般人。
もう十分堪能したし、そろそろ下に……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002550_YSHTOLA<tab>The lady may well have the right of it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002550_YSHTOLA<tab>……ご夫人の意見、ありかもしれないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002560_YSHTOLA<tab>Mt. Gulg will not soon come down to earth, nor can we compel it to do so. But if the mountain will not come to the land, mayhap the land may be made to come to the mountain...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002560_YSHTOLA当然だけど、山が戻ってくれることはないでしょう。
でも、山と地上を再度繋げることなら、可能じゃないかしら？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002570_YSHTOLA<tab>...In the form of a Talos. A Talos large enough to reach out and take the volcano in its grasp.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002570_YSHTOLA例えば……そうね……
とてつもなく巨大で頑丈なタロースを作って、
山に取りついてもらう、とか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002580_URIANGER<tab>To build such a golem would be an onerous undertaking indeed...yet the principle seemeth sound in itself.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002580_URIANGERとても斬新な案です。
タロースの形状を工夫すれば、その体を伝って、
飛ばずともグルグ火山に突入できる……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002590_CHAINUZZ<tab>Balderdash! No one has ever made one even half that size!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002590_CHAINUZZそんなの無理だ！
あの山に届くタロースだなんて、前代未聞の大きさではないか！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002600_CHAINUZZ<tab>Leaving aside the small matter of logistics─which, by the way, would be <var 1A 02 /var>no small matter<var 1A 01 /var>─the design would need to be <var 1A 02 /var>unimaginably<var 1A 01 /var> complex!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002600_CHAINUZZ<tab>組み立ては超難解、設計だけでもどれだけ…………

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002610_CHAINUZZ<tab>Though, I suppose... Hmm... If its only function is to cling to the ruddy mountain, perhaps it needn't be...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002610_CHAINUZZいや、取りつくだけという単純な動作しか仕込まないなら、
とにかく構造の維持を優先させればいいだけか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002620_CHAINUZZ<tab>A solid base, firmly rooted to the ground─sacrifice mobility to simplify the construction, reducing materials required...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002620_CHAINUZZ長距離の移動も念頭に置かず、基本的に接地させておくなら、
問題の組み立ても材料も、だいぶ簡略に……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002630_CHAINUZZ<tab>Wait, wait, wait! What am I thinking!? We would still need a veritable <var 1A 02 /var>army<var 1A 01 /var> of people to do the work!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002630_CHAINUZZい、いやいやいやいや！
何にせよ、作業にあたって多くの人手が必要になる！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002640_CHAINUZZ<tab>Left to the crew that helped down below, it would take decades, if not a nice round century!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002640_CHAINUZZ下で手伝っていた連中を呼んできたとしても、
途方もない時間がかかるぞ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002650_ALISAIE<tab>So we need more hands. And what sort of things would these hands be required to do?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002650_ALISAIEへぇ、問題は人手だけなんだ？
どんな人が必要か、言ってみなさいよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002660_CHAINUZZ<tab>Oh? Er... Well, er... Well, let's see... First, we'd need people to procure the stone for the chassis.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002660_CHAINUZZそれは、その……
まず、タロースの体となる石材を用意する者だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002670_CHAINUZZ<tab>The rock found near the mountain would suit our purposes well enough. It'd be a simple task to quarry the stuff, but given the stupendous quantity required, we'd need all the help we can get.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002670_CHAINUZZ石材は外から運んでくるのでなく、
グルグ火山周辺の岩山を、ひたすら切り崩しておけばいい。
作業としては単純だが、とにかく人数がいる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002680_THANCRED<tab>We have friends amongst the miners of Amh Araeng. I will go and petition their aid.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002680_THANCREDそれなら、アム・アレーンの鉱山から、
採掘師たちを集めてこよう。
幸い、当てがある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002690_ALISAIE<tab>While you do that, I'll make for Mord Souq. I'm sure I'll be able to drum up some support.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002690_ALISAIEそっちがアンバーヒルを回ってくれるなら、
私はモルド・スークに行くわ。
きっと、力を貸してもらえると思う。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002700_ALPHINAUD<tab>Then I shall return to Kholusia.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002700_ALPHINAUD<tab>では私は、コルシア島の各地を訪ねてみよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002710_ALPHINAUD<tab>From fishers to carpenters, Eulmore is home to all manner of talented folk. I daresay their skills will avail us.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002710_ALPHINAUD力自慢の漁師や大工はもちろん、
ユールモアに集う多彩な人々にも、活躍の場がありそうだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002720_RYNE<tab>Is there anything else you need?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002720_RYNE<tab>必要な人は、それだけですか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002730_CHAINUZZ<tab>Well...yes, actually... Magic. Lots of the stuff. As much as possible. To awaken a Talos of this size would require an entire congregation of mages.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002730_CHAINUZZ当然、起動に際して魔力を注ぐ者も要る。
これも、かなりの人数をそろえなければならないぞ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002740_YSHTOLA<tab>Many among the Night's Blessed are gifted in the arcane arts. I will recruit them to our cause.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002740_YSHTOLA「夜の民」には、魔法に覚えがある子が大勢いるわ。
行って、声をかけてきましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002750_URIANGER<tab>The fae folk too, possess surpassing aptitude in magicks. Yet they are not wont to cooperate in the endeavors of men. Leastwise, not without making all manner of mischief.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002750_URIANGER魔法ならば、妖精たちも得意としますが……
イタズラをせず、人と同調して作業するというのは、
彼らにとって至難の業。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002760_URIANGER<tab>That being the case, I would instead call upon the people of the Crystarium─with thy permission, Exarch.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002760_URIANGER然れば私はクリスタリウムに向かい、
人材を募ってきたいと思いますが……よろしいですか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002770_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>We are at your disposal, as are our amaro and chocobos.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002770_MYSTERYVOICEああ、もちろんだ。
アマロやチョコボも、自由に活用してくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002780_CHAINUZZ<tab>I'm sorry─you mean to tell me you can call on not only the people of Eulmore and the Crystarium, but the Night's Blessed, and the Mord, and even those miners!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002780_CHAINUZZ待て待て待て！
ユールモアやクリスタリウムの民だけじゃなく、
「夜の民」にモルド族、あの採掘師たちもだって！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002790_CHAINUZZ<tab>But that's just about everyone in bally Norvrandt!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002790_CHAINUZZまさか、そんな……
ノルヴラントに住む人の、ほとんどすべてではないか！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002800_CHAINUZZ<tab>Who <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> you people!? And how did you come to have so many <var 1A 02 /var>friends<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002800_CHAINUZZそれほどの縁を持つなんて、お前たちはいったい……
いったい何者なんだ！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>The saviors of the world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>この世界を救いにきた者だ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Adventurers of no import.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>旅してきただけの冒険者だ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A5_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>The artist Alphinaud and his assistants.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A5_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>アルフィノ画伯と助手たちです

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002810_CHAINUZZ<tab>Saviors of the world? Are you being serious? Oh gods, you are...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002810_CHAINUZZ世界を、救う……？
そんなことが……本気で……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002820_CHAINUZZ<tab>No import? You expect me to believe that after you just promised me the help of the better part of the world!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002820_CHAINUZZたったそれだけの者が、これほどの偉業を……？
う、嘘を言うな……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002830_DULIACHAI<tab>Oh, dearest, have you forgotten already? Alphinaud told us that when we first met.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002830_DULIACHAIそうよあなた、忘れちゃったの？
最初にご挨拶していただいたじゃない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002840_CHAINUZZ<tab>Um, actually, that may not have been... Never mind...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002840_CHAINUZZ<tab>い、いや、多分あれは……そういうことでなくてな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002850_YSHTOLA<tab>So, as you can see, you will not want for bodies. I trust you will have your design ready in good time for their arrival.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002850_YSHTOLAでは、ミスター・チャイ。
あなたはタロースの設計を進めておいてくださるかしら？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002860_YSHTOLA<tab>Norvrandt is counting on you...heir to Daedalus Stoneworks.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002860_YSHTOLA<tab>頼むわよ、ダイダロス社の跡取りさん。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002870_RYNE<tab>We'll be back as soon as we can─and we'll bring the whole world with us.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002870_RYNE必ず、みなさんをお連れしますね。
……いってきます！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002880_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>...I take it we will be assisting Master Chai. Though I am quite sure he has everything under control...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002880_MYSTERYVOICEさて、そうなると私たちは、
設計の補佐ということになりそうだが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002890_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The future is where my destiny awaits...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002890_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>あれ……あんた、どうして…………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002900_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>(GASP)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002900_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>ハッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002910_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Forgive me, I was...lost in a dream.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002910_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>すまない、寝ぼけていたようだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002920_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I needed some fresh air, and thought to rest for a moment. It would seem I am more fatigued than I realized.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002920_MYSTERYVOICEどうも身体に力が入らなくなってね。
少し風にあたって休もうとしたのだが、眠ってしまったらしい。
……申し訳ない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002930_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Too much time away from the tower, I fear. It drains me─leaves my body frail and weak.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002930_MYSTERYVOICE前にも話したことがあったと思うが、
私はクリスタルタワーから離れると体調を崩すのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002940_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Though, in truth, it is debatable whether I can still call this my body...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002940_MYSTERYVOICEいや、これは体調と言っていいものか……
私はすでに、人の身ではないのだから。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002950_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>When first I turned my mind towards the salvation of the world, I came to the conclusion that it would take many long years. Many more than remained to me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002950_MYSTERYVOICEまだ、クリスタリウムの街もなかったころ……
この世界を救う方法を考えていた私は、
どうあれ長い時間がかかると結論づけた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002960_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And so I made myself one with the Crystal Tower, that I might live indefinitely.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002960_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>そこで、自身を塔の一部にすることで、果てない命を得たのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002970_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I am but an extension of it now. Hence my weakness the farther I travel, and the longer I am away.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002970_MYSTERYVOICE今の私は、塔の端末でしかない。
だから、遠く離れていると不調をきたすというわけだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002980_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>It has been quite a journey.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002980_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>……ここまで、とても長かった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002990_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But thanks to you, the end is in sight. My wish will finally be fulfilled.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002990_MYSTERYVOICEだが、あなた方のおかげで、終わりは近い。
やっと、願いが叶う……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003000_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>How goes the construction effort?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003000_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>タロースの準備は、つつがなく進んでいるだろうか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003010_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Then this may be the last moment we have to ourselves for a while. Come, sit with me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003010_MYSTERYVOICEそうか、最後の休憩なのだな。
それなら……よければ少し、話さないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003020_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Tell me, when all of this is over, what will you do?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003020_MYSTERYVOICEあなたは、この戦いが終わったらどうする？
何かやりたいことは？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'll settle matters with the Empire.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>まずは帝国との戦争を終わらせないと

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>What I always do: seek out mightier foes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>さらに強い敵に挑みに行きたい

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A6_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Rest awhile.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A6_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>しばらくは、のんびりと過ごしたい

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A6_000_004_NONE_VOICE<tab>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A6_000_004_NONE_VOICE<tab>…………

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003030_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ah, yes. Even should we succeed in forestalling the Eighth Umbral Calamity, the specter of war will remain.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003030_MYSTERYVOICE確かに、第八霊災の可能性を排除しても、
その戦争自体が止まるわけではないからな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003040_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But to declare your intent with such easy resolve... You truly are a heroes' hero, my friend.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003040_MYSTERYVOICEしかし、まったく淀みなく断言するとは。
こういう人を英雄と呼ぶのだと、何度でも思うよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003050_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>In the hundred years they have existed, no one had come close to ridding us of even a <var 1A 02 /var>single<var 1A 01 /var> Lightwarden. Yet already you yearn for the next challenge. You truly are a world apart from us all.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003050_MYSTERYVOICE大罪喰いだって、100年間、誰も敵わなかった相手だぞ？
本当に、あなたはとんでもない人だ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003060_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>That would be well deserved. You might consider roaming Norvrandt not as her savior, but as a simple sightseer. Viewed through such eyes, I am certain she would seem quite different.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003060_MYSTERYVOICEああ、それはとてもいい。
このノルヴラントだって、散策のつもりで歩けば、
また違った味わいがあることだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003070_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Well, you needn't hurry to decide. I was merely curious to know what sort of future lay in store for a hero with <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> life ahead of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003070_MYSTERYVOICEああいや、決まっていないなら、あとでゆっくり考えるといい。
私はただ、この立派な人は次に何をするのだろうと、
興味を抱いただけだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003080_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But whatever it is you decide to do, I have every confidence that you will do well. For you have the strength to forge your own path.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003080_MYSTERYVOICEきっと、どんな未来を選んでも、あなたなら平気だろう。
道を拓くだけの強さを持っているし、それに……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003090_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>You will leave countless lives better than you found them, and the souls you touch will never forget your kindness.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003090_MYSTERYVOICEあなたに助けられた人たちが、大勢いる。
彼らは決して、そのことを忘れない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003100_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Then, in trying times, when you question your worth and your choices, they will raise their voices to remind you of the difference you have made.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003100_MYSTERYVOICEあなたが困難を前にして、己の行いを無価値に感じたときには、
彼らが声を上げるだろう。
嬉しかった、優しさに救われた、今でも感謝していると。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003110_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And thus will your deeds come to affirm your path. Remember this.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003110_MYSTERYVOICEそれらはいつか繋がって、あなたの歩んだ道を肯定する。
だから……大丈夫だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> do when this is over?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>水晶公は、終わったら何をしたい？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I would know more of you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>たまにはそっちのことも話せ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003120_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>When this is over... Indeed...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003120_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>これが終わったら……そうだな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003130_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Of <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>? You mean what I intend to do afterwards?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003130_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>私のこと……私の今後か……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003140_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I once told you that there are things we can ill afford to lose.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003140_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>……以前、私には救いたい人がいると言っただろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003150_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>"Things,“ I said, though in truth I spoke of a person. One who is unaware of the full extent of my plans. Though he deserves to know, I have good reason to keep my counsel.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003150_MYSTERYVOICEあの人は、今も生きている……が、
とても特別な事情があって、私は彼と正面から向き合えない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003160_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>“Things,” I said, though in truth I spoke of a person. One who is unaware of the full extent of my plans. Though she deserves to know, I have good reason to keep my counsel.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003160_MYSTERYVOICEあの人は、今も生きている……が、
とても特別な事情があって、私は彼女と正面から向き合えない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003170_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I have come to terms with this in my mind, yet my heart yearns to lay everything bare. For <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> is my inspiration, and I would give much and more for the chance to speak with <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> as friends, with no thought of concealment.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003170_MYSTERYVOICEそれは仕方がないことだと、理解しているがね。
あの人は私にとって、いちばん憧れの英雄なんだ……
叶うならば、気兼ねなく話がしたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003180_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Should <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> indulge me with <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> tales, I would regale <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> with my own─about my efforts in Norvrandt, perhaps.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003180_MYSTERYVOICEあちらが旅の話をしてくれたら、
私も、ノルヴラントを救うまでの話をしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003190_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Though...ultimately, that tale is more yours than it is mine.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003190_MYSTERYVOICE私もそれなりに尽力したつもりだが、
なんといっても、最終的に活躍したのはあなただ。
格好はつかないかもしれないな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003200_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Then...I would ask <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> about <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> next adventure. And if <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> should wish me to be a part of it, oh...how happy it would make me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003200_MYSTERYVOICEそして……あの人に、次の旅についての計画を聞く。
そこに私も加わることになっていたら、どれほど嬉しいだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003210_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Together, we would travel the lands and cross the seas and take to the skies upon the eternal wind... My heart swells simply to imagine it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003210_MYSTERYVOICE大地を駆けて、海を渡り、ときには悠久の風に乗って空へ。
なんて眩しい、遥かな夢だ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003220_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But all of this is contingent upon our victory in the coming battle.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003220_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>さて、何はともあれ、最後の決戦に勝たなくては。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003230_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The people of this world have entrusted their hopes to us. We cannot fail them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003230_MYSTERYVOICE必ず、すべてを成し遂げて見せる。
この手に託されてきた、人々の願いを叶えるために。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003240_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>...Nor those who roused me from my slumber.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003240_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>……希望を抱いて私を目覚めさせた、彼らのためにも。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003250_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Thank you for your company, my friend. Let us return to Amity.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003250_MYSTERYVOICEありがとう、話せて楽しかった。
アミティーに戻るとしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003260_YSHTOLA<tab>Word from the Exarch. All is set on his side, and we may proceed when ready.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003260_YSHTOLA水晶公から連絡がきたわ。
あちらの準備は万全、いつはじめてもいいそうよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003270_THANCRED<tab>Well, we have sufficient stone for our needs.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003270_THANCRED<tab>石材の方は、予定した量が準備できている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003280_URIANGER<tab>Likewise, preparations for the imbuing have been made according to thine exacting instructions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003280_URIANGER<tab>魔力を流し込む準備も、ご指示のとおりに。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003290_ALPHINAUD<tab>Then you need only say the word!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003290_ALPHINAUD<tab>では、これで……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003300_YSHTOLA<tab>Let us begin. See that everyone is in position.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003300_YSHTOLAタロースを起動するわ！
総員、ただちに配置につくように、誘導して頂戴。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003310_YSHTOLA<tab>We shall catch Vauthry, mountain and all!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003310_YSHTOLA<tab>ヴァウスリーを、居城ごと捕まえてやりましょう……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003320_CHAINUZZ<tab>Here it comes!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003320_CHAINUZZ<tab>さあ来る、来るぞッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003330_CHAINUZZ<tab>Hah hah! Yes! <var 1A 02 /var>Yes<var 1A 01 /var>! You've not lost your touch, you clever old bugger!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003330_CHAINUZZいいぞいいぞ、最高だ！
まだまだやるじゃないか私ぃ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003340_CHAINUZZ<tab>Do you see what they're doing!? If its hands are damaged, it won't be able to cling to the mountain! Oh, I <var 1A 02 /var>knew<var 1A 01 /var> this was a terrible idea!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003340_CHAINUZZお、おい、まずいぞ！
奴ら、手ばかり狙っているではないか！
あそこが損傷したら、山に取りついていられなくなる！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003350_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Vauthry marshals the eaters to his defense. This was only to be expected.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003350_MYSTERYVOICE……罪喰いにしては、いつになく利口な動きをする。
ヴァウスリーの指示だとしたら、脅威だな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003360_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>We must try and draw as many of them down to the ground as possible. It may not be enough, but we have no other choice.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003360_MYSTERYVOICE仕方ない、動ける仲間に連絡して、
罪喰いを地上に引きつけるとしよう。
どこまで効果があるかはわからないが……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003370_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Is that─?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003370_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>あれは……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003380_FEOUL<tab>Such a heartless thing our sapling is! Cold and cruel and <var 1A 02 /var>heartless<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003380_FEOULひどい……ひどいのだわ！
私の若木は、やっぱり薄情者なのだわ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003390_FEOUL<tab>Summon us in times of need, we <var 1A 02 /var>expressly<var 1A 01 /var> said─yet what should we find but the final battle joined without so much as a <var 1A 02 /var>whisper<var 1A 01 /var> of our name!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003390_FEOUL本当に困ったときには必ず呼んでと言ったのに、
いつまでも呼ばれないまま、決戦がはじまってしまうなんて！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003400_FEOUL<tab>Yes, yes, we may also have said that we fae folk have no interest in the struggles of men─
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003400_FEOUL確かに妖精は、ヒトの思いどおりに動いたりしないわ。
ええ、ええ、私自らそんな話もしたのだわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003410_FEOUL<tab>But if our <var 1A 02 /var>adorable<var 1A 01 /var> sapling had come crying to us for help, we would of <var 1A 02 /var>course<var 1A 01 /var> have flown to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> aid! Of course we would! What are we to do with <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003410_FEOULでも、かわいい若木が泣きついてきたら、
考えなくもなかったのに！
やっぱりひどい、ひどいのだわ……っ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003420_FEOUL<tab>We are so very, very sad. <var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> will play with us. <var 1A 02 /var>Cheer us up again<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003420_FEOUL私、とっても悲しいわ。
気晴らしに、たくさん遊んで頂戴ね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Thank you, Feo Ul.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>ありがとうティターニア……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I think they're mad at me...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>なんだか怒られてる気がする

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003430_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>This I did not expect. But I will gladly accept the help.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003430_MYSTERYVOICE予想外ではあるが、妖精王が力を貸してくれるならありがたい。
これでタロースも、しばらくの間は、
